name: Bumper Bots
description:
Just a simple little game that me and some friends/family made for the jam. You play as robots who need to connect to other robotic parts (and guns) and then blow each other up. 

This is our first time releasing a Unity game for a jam. Had fun making it!

  • 2 to 4 players
  • Gamepad compatible
  • No online play is available. Local multiplayer only
  • Many glitches in this one (apologies)

BUG WARNING:

If you want to redo a match, don't click the RETRY button. It breaks the game and stops you from being able to collect any items. Instead, click the MAIN MENU button to start a new match. 

Controls:

  • Move: WASD / left stick
  • Shoot: click / right trigger
  • Activate Smart Bomb: right click / right bumper
  • Boost with Jets (not working yet): spacebar / x button (Xbox) / square button (PlayStation)
